snippet: While malls appear to be past their peak in the United States, in Russia they are luring shoppers with money to spend and investors like Morgan Stanley.
abstract: Russia's malls are luring shoppers and investors, even as such shopping centers appear past their peak in the United States; mall boom reflects an emerging middle class in Russia that is becoming a force in business as well as politics.
lead_paragraph: While malls appear to be past their peak in the United States, in Russia they are luring shoppers with money to spend and investors like Morgan Stanley.

headline.seo: With a Mall Boom in Russia, Property Investors Go Shopping
headline.main: Malls Blossom in Russia, With a Middle Class
headline.print_headline: Malls Blossom in Russia, With a Middle Class
